item.description:
What happens when you mix a Boston Pub Crawl, a Booze Cruise, and MTV’s Ultimate Cover band?
The answer is Boston’s Zoo Cruise N Crawl! Things to Do Boston has teamed up again with Tenon Tours crew on Friday, August 7th for this epic event.

Here’s the Schedule:

5:30 PM – 7:30 PM: Exclusive Pre-Party @ M.J. O’Connor’s Waterfront.
Included: FREE APPETIZERS, 1 FREE BEER, and chances to win 1 of 2 $500 FLIGHT VOUCHERS TO IRELAND!*

7:30 PM – 8:00 PM: Crawl over to the World Trade Center and join 800 others as we board the Provincetown II for the Annual Coors Light Zoo Cruise. Included are FREE APPETIZERS, Live Performance by The Zoo, MTV’s Ultimate Cover band!

11:00 PM – 1:00 AM: Hop back onto the mainland and crawl over to The Harp for the After Party. Show your Tenon Tours wristband for express line entry and no cover!

This is a 21+ Event, and proper dress and ID are required.
Although the Zoo Cruise capacity is 1000, the Crawl only has 200 spots available. Based on the fact that our St. Patrick’s Day Pre-Party and Pub Crawl sold out within a week, it is imperative that you purchase your tickets early! Purchase your tickets at the Things To Do Boston website www.thingstodoboston.com
item.name: Zoo Cruise n' Crawl
